attributes.action: Decline the request for Wales to home 1.5 million Palestinian refugees
attributes.additional_details: The Welsh NHS and housing is already stretched beyond comprehension. We simply do not have what is needed to home one and a half million more people. People are waiting weeks if not months for a phone appointment with the doctor. A&E waiting times has reached beyond 12 hours, there are no hospital beds available. There is a 4 year wait to be considered a council home as it is because there simply isn't enough housing as it is.
attributes.background: Decline the request to home 1.5 million refugees in Wales.

rejection.details: There is no official request or proposal from the UK Government, Welsh Government, or international bodies to resettle 1.5 million Palestinian refugees in Wales.
